sourcesContent:
URL SHORTNER


Short URL: {{ shortUrl }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Url } from 'url'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { originalUrl: any; shortUrl: string =""; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } shortenUrl() { this.http.post('/api/Url/ShortenUrl', this.originalUrl).subscribe (result => { this.shortUrl = result; }, (error) => { console.error(error); }); } }
